website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, stylish, and comfortable baby sling with quality fabric that can be slightly more difficult to use than some other slings on the market.
pros: We love the great range of attractive fabric colors, the quality of the carrier, and ring design that allows babies to sit or lay in different positions
The fabric is lightweight and the pocket design makes it convenient for travel
cons: The lack of clear instructions and occasional issues with the sling's pouch mean this sling may come with a steeper learning curve than some of the other slings available

customer_reviews.title: Bad ring, bad material
customer_reviews.text: Not a good ring. Went to a local baby wearing group & the difference between this & the better ones with a larger metal ring & better material is like night & day. If you look at a lot of the better reviews, you will see they received this product for free.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispi

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not what I thought it would be. It came with no directions on how to use it and when I went online to look around, whatever I saw never worked! My baby is long and never felt comfy or secure wearing it! Complete waste of $$.
customer_reviews.author: NDGB

customer_reviews.title: *****Great product!*****
customer_reviews.text: I'm really excited to say that this sling is a lifesaver! It makes my life with a newborn so much easier. There have been times where he just doesn't want to be in his stroller when we are out, so I always bring the sling with us. I tried a wrap with my first son, and it was just too much material to be convenient anywhere outside of our house. I also had C sections, and I found that a sling is much more comfortable than the wrap was. I like the material of this wrap, it's lightweight yet not at all flimsy. I wish I had this with my first and second children, it's really a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: SFam

customer_reviews.title: I fee like if there were a little more padding in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ring slings are really only practical for very young infants. Can't wear with my 18 lb 1 year old for more than 30 mins without shoulder/neck discomfort and lots of adjusting. I fee like if there were a little more padding in the shoulder it would be better?? Fine for around the house, but totally impractical and a pain while out and about.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I do like this wrap, it gets warm so not great in the summer unless you keep your house really cold! I thought it would be fine but I found myself and the baby very warm after walking around the house doing dishes and things in the middle of winter, so I have to think summer would be worse. If you get one of these, the fabric is kind of thick, but very pliable and comfortable. Get one that has color coated sides, when you try to tighten this thing it is hard to be able to tell which end is top and which is bottom because they are the same color.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Clapper

customer_reviews.title: Lame and not practical what so ever
customer_reviews.text: The Mamaway Ring Sling Baby Wrap didn't work for us because it's just not secure enough. I used it as a hip carrier for my daughter who is 25lbs. She is active and the rings didn't hold the fabric in place for longer than 15 minutes. Her bottom kept coming out of the "seat" that you are supposed to create with the fabric. Lame and not practical what so ever. The only thing that is practical or helpful about the Mamaway Ring Sling Baby Wrap is the overall size of it, it's compact.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product. My baby is 6 months now, but weighs 22lbs, so she gets heavy quickly. This sling helps support her if we are out and about and not using the stroller. Love the hip carry with this. It was awesome when she was tiny too, she would nap right in there while I grocery shopped, during a baby shower, at dinner, it was great. Easy to throw in a diaper bag so you can have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: RH612

customer_reviews.title: they are nicely made and can be put away very easily
customer_reviews.text: I suggest every mother gets one of these, they are nicely made and can be put away very easily. My diaper bag is already disorganized and the packaging really helps keep things tidy. My 19 month old still fits in this and its perfect for days when she doesn't want to walk anymore or too tired. sometimes when she is having a bad day its nice to be able to wear her throughout the house hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Love my ring sling
customer_reviews.text: Love my ring sling! I went frm a moby wrap to this one and glad i did! Its so much easier carrying my daughter around this way! Im able to bond with my child and get things done! I especially love to use it when i grocery shop and she naps in it! Its very easy to put on once you get the hang of it, there are some videos you can watch that will help along the way, i encourage watching those. Overall this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: smcph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a ring sling before, and the one other experience I had trying one was a failure. This ring sling is very well made & pretty simple to use. You do need to watch the video on their website to figure out the first steps, but from there it is pretty easy. My 2 week old fit nicely. So far I'm not feeling much back strain or pain too. After researching all kinds of ring slings, this one is of great quality at a reasonable price. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love love love- bought specifically to use in the airport w my 6 week old. we have Maitai carrier as well that i adore but for airport travel this sling was so much better since you have to take the baby in and out a few times- like to change before getting on the plane- as well as take off and landing- this was much easier to navigate then tying my maitai over and over. Im petite so Standard Ergo type carriers just wont work for me.
customer_reviews.author: KTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring sling, easy to wear, sturdy, good for cold or warm weather.. I wear it for my little guy since he was 6 weeks old and about 9lbs. Now he's 12lbs and I think once he's able to held his head uo, it woild even easier for us to use this carrier. The only downside of this carrier is that this sling is really hard to thread and I have to fix it every time I want to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Orie Lim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the first ring sling i have ever owned and I was worried that it would be difficult to use, but it was actually very easy. Still haven't figured out how to nurse my 3 week old in it hands free. The material is nice, very good quality and I think very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Way too much fabric! It’s thick cotton also so hard to maneuver with the amount of fabric. Does not come with instructions. I tried scanning QR code and looking online for information and NONE are in English. I won’t use this, i ordered a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: HettieF

customer_reviews.title: Great sling but still need to support babies head while breast feeding
customer_reviews.text: Wife here. The colors and quality are beautiful. I am always getting compliments on it. Takes some time getting accustomed to using but helps me get things done in the house. The photo seems misleading as It's not 100% hands free but I have most of my supporting hand available. (this is for breast feeding). Otherwise I love it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S Shepro

customer_reviews.title: Baby hates it
customer_reviews.text: It might be used error, but my baby hated this. I could never get it right, it would be loose in one spot, too tight on another... but the fabric and rings are solid. Really didn't like how the baby lays away from the rings, as directed... it felt unsafe. But again, may just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: Very rough on your back, even with a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Very rough on your back, even with a small baby. Also, I found it very hard to keep the baby in a correct position, without hunching over or sliding down. It needs constant adjustment and feels uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ds

customer_reviews.title: This product needs to come with a human instructor. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product needs to come with a human instructor. I have watched videos to no prevail. It is very expensive. Do not buy unless you already know how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice material and quality... just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't quite get the hang of the ring sling. I watched a number of videos and seeked out help. It never felt comfortable and my baby did not care for it. My baby is on the large side - she was around 15 lbs when we started using the sling. I ended up giving this away. The material was really nice and it was well made. I also loved that it folded down into the bag to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive company, pretty wrap
customer_reviews.text: After my purchase, the Mamaway company emailed me with product info, links to videos, and contact for support. They've also emailed to follow up on my satisfaction. I've been pretty impressed. I like the wrap, though I am still trying to figure out how to get it set up the right way with my newborn. I think I just need to keep practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love it and little one is super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Roan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sling
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sling! This is my first RS (I'm normally a SSC kinda gal) and it has completely replaced my SSCs at the moment- even my Tulas! For a newborn, I think I 100% prefer the ease of the sling. It took a while to figure out and get used to, but I watched the youtube videos and they helped a ton. I can also breastfeed in this without a problem, and use the tail to cover. I am not capable of breastfeeding in a SSC!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Light, breathable fabric. We have an August baby. Finding a carrier that didn't cause her to overheat was a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: A great product, but DONT PUT IT IN THE DRYER! It will shrink like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Takach

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but it can get rather tricky to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but it can get rather tricky to adjust it once the baby is in, the fabric gets stuck in the rings, and my husband has to help me to fix it. But i think it's lack of practice on my side, not the con of the sling. It was a little stressful for both me and the baby at first, but once I figured out how it works, the baby started to like it!
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Difficult.
customer_reviews.text: The ring sling seems to be a little more difficult for my baby and I. The customer service is great. I just wish instead of videos they had a written step by step with pictures. The fabric is also I little rougher than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B.

customer_reviews.title: there are several videos online, but some youtube videos ...
customer_reviews.text: there are several videos online, but some youtube videos are more precise on instruction. Sometimes my back still hurts with this, but i probably have to apply it on tighter. baby loves being in this and feeling secure
customer_reviews.author: Papa G

customer_reviews.title: I love the fabric and prize
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric and prize, however I do wish it come with a hidden pocket to store small things for days when I don't need/want to carry my entire purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this product. I use it every day and I get complemented on the color pattern almost every time I use it outside the house. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Baby wearing is easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I am easily able to wear my baby with this ring sling. The worst part of it is that it didn't come with directions but there are helpful videos online. It is very easy to wear my nine month old around while doing errands and cleaning the house. I received the product for free for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: ikkint213

customer_reviews.title: a sleep deprived mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sling when my new baby wouldn't let me put her down. I had to be able to function. With the instructional videos, and some practice, I finally got the hang of using the DLing and it saved my life. I can now do things while she sleeps in the sling, and she cries less-double plus!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Very well made and my squish loves it. Falls asleep within minutes. I highly suggest watching a few how-to videos. There is a learning curve to getting the rings to sit high enough. My only complaint is that the rings are sewn on the fabric in such a way that it makes it difficult to spread over the cap of your shoulder. This limits your range of motion a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for two kids under age 2!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the ring sling every single day since buying it. I have a fussy infant that is not happy in any swings or rockers. She needs to be held constantly. This carrier is easy to put on in a hurry and the baby settles down very quickly once in it. She also feels well supported. I also have the Moby wrap. I like Moby but it takes much more time to put on which is a hassle when dealing with a crying infant and a toddler. This is a must if you have two children under 2!
customer_reviews.author: skyblue4ever

customer_reviews.title: Put a lot of pressure on shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't really figure out a comfortable and efficient way to use this. Very good quality just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzi Ray Yarberry

customer_reviews.title: We like the sling
customer_reviews.text: We like the sling, but it does not come with instructions. We had to google wearing instructions and positions for different ages which is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy sling
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product- I used in with my daughter and it was so helpful. This particular sling arrived in a plastic bag, looking used. The storage box was packed empty and broken. I did not buy a used product. So, I’m a little disappointed I feel the need to was this item before I’m able to use it. Who pulled it out of the box?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great product, but I have had trouble getting my baby in where I am comfortable walking around. I have watched videos, I think it just takes practice
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This carrier is so beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is so beautiful and easy to use. I put it on my 8 year old son so he could carry his sister and he is in heaven! He is asking to go for walks now as his excuse to wear his sister. Great bonding time for them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Fabric is good quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Fabric is good quality and cute. Sling is user friendly. This works well for a plus size mommy. I wanted to hip carry my 10.5 month old and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittiany McEwen

customer_reviews.title: Must get!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! My little man is 12 months and 25lbs, and I am 7 months pregnant. Carrying him was becoming difficult, but now I barley feel his weight and unlike other carriers I can use this one. Can't wait to try it out with the new baby. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors and so comfortable. Infant granddaughter loves spending time in it so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors and so comfortable. Infant granddaughter loves spending time in it so mommy has hands free for big sister . Both of my daughters use this for their kids after trying other brands they are very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't come with any instructions. Thank goodness for ...
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't come with any instructions. Thank goodness for youtube. Watched the videos multiple times. Definitely a learning curve to getting the hang of this thing. Practice, practice practice. My son fell asleep in it for the first time today. He's 8 weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and fabric
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and fabric. Sadly I wasn't able to wear the sling comfortably. I watched a ton of videos and followed the instructions; however, something didn't feel right. Retuned the sling for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great sling
customer_reviews.text: The sling was a gift. New mom seem very pleased with it, can’t rate the cleaning process.
customer_reviews.author: susan machado

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it :)
customer_reviews.text: She will be using again here soon for the next baby. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sling, and so does my son. Mamaway sent me a very useful email as soon as I purchased this with links to videos to learn the various ways to carry. I highly recommend this sling!
customer_reviews.author: A. TeGrotenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this sling on two of my babies and disliked it for both. It is hard to adjust and gets uncomfortable really fast even for a 7 lb baby. Save your money and get a better carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wrap is perfect and makes life so easy
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time with my infant and he is 5 weeks I wish I would have started when I brought him home. This wrap is perfect and makes life so easy. He is nice and snug and well loves it!
customer_reviews.author: tracy c.

customer_reviews.title: Really thick high quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with more instructions or online support. Good quality and pretty colors I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.author: RedMcQ

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this! This is a must have for moms. Super easy to use. Folds back up in pocket for easy storage and the pocket is great when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Cnurmi

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay when my daughter was a couple months old. After that, I always felt like she was going to fall out the bottom so I had to hold her and that defeated the purpose of the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: I returned this sling. The fabric was not at all soft, and the pocket thing laid really funny when I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mohn

customer_reviews.title: The ergo is better. Might as we'll spend the money on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The ergo is better. Might as we'll spend the money on the ergo and not this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sling!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is great! It's so much easier than the Boba wrap I tried and less fussy than the infantino carrier I have. My son seems comfortable in it and it's super easy to get on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Amy LaMee

customer_reviews.title: Great ring sling!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these so i could tandemwear my twins and i love them. They're comfy but very durable and the fabric is nice and thick. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how it holds baby but constantly having to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: nagromd

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling! Material is soft and washes well. Very easy to use. It's really comfortable, I've worn it for hours with no neck or back pain. Also doubles as a nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. I really wanted to love this sling
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I really wanted to love this sling, as I have tried 3 different carriers for my newborn and wanted something simple that he could nurse in. The cradle carry does NOT work at all for a 7 week old baby. I could not get this to hold him correctly after multiple attempts. All it did was squeeze him into a ball with zero support. Maybe it would be better for the upright carry, but I have no idea how the woman in the video shows the baby in the cradle carry and claims you can nurse like that. I bought it specifically for that. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Violette

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric feels soft and very cool for So FL weather. Getting baby in and out is very easy. Fabric slides smoothly through the rings. Walked through crowded mall for hours, also breastfed and had no problems. Previously I've used the Maya sling and was not as satisfying. All in all a great baby carrier.
customer_reviews.author: lissaydi becquer

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for extended periods of time
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves This! It does take some time to get used to. After about 10 minutes your shoulder does hurt (or your neck if you place it there).
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... and I could never get the ring in a comfortable position on my shoulder/collar bone area
customer_reviews.text: No instructions were included and I could never get the ring in a comfortable position on my shoulder/collar bone area. Ended up only using it three times before getting a soft structure carrier. Also learned from my baby wearing group that this brand isn’t safe. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: lauren sorel

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for baby
customer_reviews.text: Was very hard to get baby comfortable. I felt like she was squeezed and smothered in it.
customer_reviews.author: B holliday

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Easy to use I'm a FTM and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to use I'm a FTM and wanted something that I could easily breastfeed while using and it was perfect. Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Daniek

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to throw in your purse
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and easy to throw in your purse. I have a 28 lb 13 month old and it gives my arms a break and allows him to be close and cuddle. A good option to have at your disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful! Love it! Perfect for carrying my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great for mother and child
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law loves it. It enables her to handle her daily tasks while maintaining the bond between mother and child
customer_reviews.author: mattp

customer_reviews.title: Its really tough on your shoulder and neck. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Its really tough on your shoulder and neck. I also did not feel my son was supported enough to take my hands off his back and head.
customer_reviews.author: Katie King

customer_reviews.title: great gift!
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a gift for my sister and she LOVES IT! its a very well constructed sling and keeps her baby close to her.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Forte

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I like my Seven Sling better. This is my second baby and I thought the ring sling would be stronger but did not feel comfortable with it and its not as quick as the Seven Sling. Sending it back :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and soft fabric!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft fabric. Exactly as the picture showed!!! Instructions for newborns were a plus! Arrived sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it did not work for me. It was 2 small. An not for what I thought I could have used it for.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Foose

customer_reviews.title: I like this sling
customer_reviews.text: I like this sling, and the concept, but it's hard for me to use. Takes a lot more practice to use this than I expected. I got a baby carrier with straps & clips instead.
customer_reviews.author: BrBeRG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item.
customer_reviews.text: Will not go to a baby shower without giving this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: My baby and I like it. However, my wife does not like it. It's convenience to me at least when I need to hold my baby.
customer_reviews.author: stevenyoung

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Best baby carrier I have purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Shopper fun

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest sling to use, but comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: rachaelgood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love being able to have my 10 month old on my hip and both hands free
customer_reviews.author: Acecoop

customer_reviews.title: love love love it
customer_reviews.text: love love love it! even though i dont feel the padding they claim is on the shoulder part its still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Monisha Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well after I watched the how-to videos they ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well after I watched the how-to videos they emailed me. It did not come with instructions, so they were essential.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarsaurus_rex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality, beautiful sling
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality, beautiful sling. Very easy to use and set up, my 5 month old fell asleep in it almost immediately !!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sling but the cheaper ones are just as great. Love the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: george31

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything product says it is. Little stiff. You will have to break it in.
customer_reviews.author: Luckybethany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! And the baby is super comfy in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! And the baby is super comfy in it! She falls asleep while in the sling all the time :) Easy to put on and adjust to baby's size.
customer_reviews.author: Kris A.

customer_reviews.title: pricey for a cloth with a buckle
customer_reviews.text: This thing was difficult to use and baby sags into it awkwardly. We found a ergo baby for roughly the same price and it is much easier to cary baby in.
customer_reviews.author: Alexah Hart

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, sturdy, stylish, and supportive. Best part is that it is easy to use- no excessive wrapping or preparation- grab it and go!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Nice sling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sling right after I had my third baby and I was interested in getting into babywearing. I began using it when she 3 weeks old, so far I am very satisfied with the product, it has helped me out on many occasions. It's a nice alternative aside from using strollers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: ... on the shoulder made it impossible to get a comfortable "cap" and put a lot of strain on my ...
customer_reviews.text: The pocket on the shoulder made it impossible to get a comfortable "cap" and put a lot of strain on my neck.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves being close and I love the freedom! I enjoy using my sling while shopping, not needing to push a stroller is great. Well worth the pay 👍🏼☺️
customer_reviews.author: M.Fields

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Your sling is just right; it's easy to use, comfortable for both mom/grandma and baby, and it's well made. We love the fabric. It has just the right amount of style (not too flashy or too drab). It's loved by all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Have tried other wrap carriers and love this one because it's adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other wrap carriers and love this one because it's adjustable. Great for nursing. A little challenging to get newborn in at first but with some trial and error got it figured out.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Still concerned
customer_reviews.text: The carrier came much quicker than expected and as described. Maybe I'm not experienced enough as I am a first time user of the slings but even after watching hours of YouTube video manuals and practicing at home with my baby I'm still concerned that my 3 months old might fall out! She is a mover and fidgets a lot inside the sling sometimes trying to straighten up her body which leads to losing that "pocket" under her bum... That's why I always keep one of my hands under her to prevent any possible falls. Consequently I'm never hands-free as they promise. Otherwise the sling looks fine and feels pretty easy in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya Garibovic

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is very slippery, so my 6month son ...
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very slippery, so my 6month son can't be more than 20 minute on this sling. Will try to wash it, it may be help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this wrap. I watched all the videos and even had 4 others try and help me figure it out, but all 5 of us couldn't get it to work properly and felt it was unsafe for my baby. Sadly because it was suggested to wash it so it would work better I could no longer return it so I'm out the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

customer_reviews.title: ... have tried so many carrier and finally found the best one! 100% happy with
customer_reviews.text: Loveee ittttt i have tried so many carrier and finally found the best one! 100% happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite baby carrier. I'm used to a strap over each shoulder making carrying much nicer on your back and entire body. I also found myself constantly tugging on it to tighten it back up. For the price of this thing, I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: A K Cav

customer_reviews.title: because I know so many people love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I assume this is just me, because I know so many people love this thing, but I just could NOT figure out how to use it. Either the baby's head was not secure or I felt like the baby was being suffocated. The company seems awesome and has a ton of videos to help you learn how to use the sling, but it just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R MacMullen

customer_reviews.text: Haven't figured out how to use yet Material is strong and sturdy Rings "lock" material in place Seems reliable
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: It is difficult to thread and does not feel good against my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to thread and does not feel good against my shoulder. Plus side is it doesn't slip when baby is in it
customer_reviews.author: watrouscrewmomma

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and painful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this thing but it gave me the hardest time and made me sore. I watched videos, read reviews and still could not get this to work properly for me. I have a wriggly daughter who loves being worn, but not in this type of carrier. She moved around way too much for me to get a good 'seat' for her and this hurt my shoulder like you wouldn't believe.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't figure out how to get this to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out how to get this to hold my baby securely, even after watching numerous how to videos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mamaway Ring Sling Baby Wrap Carrier for Infant, Newborn, Toddler, Nursing Cover, Breastfeeding Privacy, Baby Holder, Breathable Fabric, 100% Cotton-Rainbow Crayon
feature_bullets: ＊ONE SIZE FITS ALL BABIES AND PARENTS: Suitable for all Babies & Toddlers, Moms and Dads. Tested to hold up to 110 lbs over 24 hours. With the extra fabric width, Mamaway ring slings are simple to adjust and easy to carry your child around comfortably and safely. Perfect item for moms and dads to take turns carrying your little one.

＊CREATE WOMB-LIKE ENVIRONMENT TO BOND WITH YOUR CHILD: Baby-wearing mimics the womb environment and offers your child security and tranquility. Your baby will sleep soundly in the wrap and be less frequently alarmed. The sling can also be used as a nursing cover, a blanket, or a postpartum belly band. 100% cotton sturdy fabric makes nursing your newborn in the wrap comfortable and discreet.

＊ERGONOMIC POUCH FOR HEALTHY HIP DEVELOPMENT: The curved M-shaped pouch design makes a deep pocket that provides a more comfortable fit for baby and a better grip on baby's hips and thighs. Most moms find it with less slipping problem for squirmy babies. Designed to evenly distribute baby's weight along your back and shoulders for you to effortlessly carry your baby for long hours with no back pains.

＊CONVENIENT AND SAFE AT THE SAME TIME: Our carrier ring is made from Nylon 66 that is light-weighed and stronger than steel wire. With the patented pocket design and an overall 0.66 lbs weight, the sling is compact enough to pack away in a diaper bag. Lightly padded shoulder portion and railings distribute the baby’s weight through torso to avoid straining baby’s neck and provide the right amount of cushioning for baby's tender thighs, with no sharp edge cutting into flesh.

＊HIGH IQ COOL COMFORT FOR BETTER TEMPERATURE REGULATION: Our ring slings are made with 100% Premium Combed Cotton with High IQ Cool Comfort Technology, allowing the sling to breathe and take away heat & moisture from your baby. Unlike usual baby carriers, Mamaway sling carrier creates no overheating problem for baby and mother, which is perfect for hot weather and a hassle-free summer.
